title: Is There No Goddess in My College?
description: College baseball player Ji Maengho's life became hell after losing his parents to an accident and suffering an injury. it does a complete 180 when he makes a deal with the ghost of a legendary Major Leaguer. Maengho becomes the top prospect with his cheat code ability and vows to conquer both pro baseball and womenâ€¦
author: Epiphany
